channel.title: BeHer on Prosper Us Detroit

item.title: People of ProsperUS: Jamie Hendrix
item.description: People of ProsperUS: Jamie Hendrix By: Anna Gotskind BeHer is a women’s clothing store that offers a variety of tops, bottoms, one-pieces, and dresses in sizes ranging from small to plus-sized. Based in Morningside Detroit, BeHer specializes in urban street style and transitional all-day wear allowing customers to wear the pieces both to work as well as any evening event after. Jamie Hendrix, the founder of BeHer, started out wanting to restore a storefront in her community of Morningside.
